snippet: The Yankees missed a pristine opportunity to sweep the Rays, claim sole possession of first place and carry a winning streak into the weekend’s Subway Series.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays defeat New York Yankees, 7-3.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees missed a pristine opportunity to sweep the Rays, claim sole possession of first place and carry a winning streak into the weekend’s Subway Series.

headline.seo: Yankees Miss Chance to Move Into First
headline.main: Error and Strikeouts Prevent Yankee Sweep
headline.print_headline: With Chance to Sweep, Yankees Throw It Away
